titleStmt.title: Melpomene: or, The muses delight Being new poems and songs. Written by several of the great wits of our present age, as I.D. T.F. S.W. T.S. C.O. I.B. &c. Collected together, and now printed.
New collection of poems and songs.
Melpomene: or, The muses delight Being new poems and songs. Written by several of the great wits of our present age, as I.D. T.F. S.W. T.S. C.O. I.B. &c. Collected together, and now printed.
New collection of poems and songs.
titleStmt.author: Bulteel, John, fl. 1683.
Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of Rochester, 1647-1680. aut
Owen, Corbett, 1646-1671. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for H. Rogers at the Bible in Westminster-Hall, against the Court of Common Pleas,

notesStmt.note: Collected and edited by John Bulteel.
Contains poems by John Wilmot, Earl of Rochester, Corbett Owen, and others.
Leaf a3 is mis-signed a2; leaf A1 (bastard title) is cancelled.
Running title reads: New poems and songs.
A reissue, with cancel title page, of Wing B5457, i.e. the 1674 edition with Bulteel's name on title page and with title "A new collection of poems and songs".
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.

person.persName: Rochester, John Wilmot, Earl of Rochester,
